required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Fluzoparib in Healthy Subjects and Those With Impaired Liver Function
clinical_study.official_title: A Open, Single-dose, Parallel-control Study to Investigate the Pharmacokinetics of Fluzoparib in Healthy Subjects and Those With Impaired Liver Function.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed to evaluate the safety and pharmacokinetics of Fluzoparib in subjects with impaired liver function in comparison with healthy subjects ,to develop dose recommendations for patients with hepatic impairment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an averange of half year
through study completion, an averange of half year

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of Fluzoparib: AUC0-∞(if available)
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an averange of half year

secondary_outcome.measure: Other pharmacokinetics parameters of Fluzoparib: Tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an averange of half year

secondary_outcome.measure: plasma protein binding rate of Fluzoparib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an averange of half year

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of adverse events/serious adverse events (based on NCI-CTCAE 5.0)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an averange of half year

secondary_outcome.measure: Other pharmacokinetics parameters of Fluzoparib: T1/2 etc.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an averange of half year

intervention.description: A single oral dose of 50 mg Fluzoparib will be administered.
